activities: Dober has a division (Spindle Technologies) that provides commercial laundry facilities with software that displays employee productivity.  Data is tracked by employee name and is not tied into customer HR or time tracking systems.  Data collected by Spindle is used to display employee productivity on visual dashboards located on premise at customer facilities.  This data is used by plant managers to determine overall plant efficiencies.  Plant data is then aggregated at the Spindle datacenter to provide reporting for commercial laundry corporate headquarters.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Date processed that is covered by our organization includes employee name for participating customers.
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the Dober Privacy Office at the 11230 Katherine's Crossing, Woodrige, IL 60517. Dober will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy.  Dober has further committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Dober, you may contact BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.
